name: League Bowling
description: The lanes are crowded every night with Big Time Pin Slammin' action, You call the shots selecting a right or left handed bowler. Determine ball weight, and develop the skills of the pro's as you skillfully throw a variety of shots that you control! Choose from 3 separate modes of play, "Regulation, Flash!, or ''Strike 90". Bowl with 1 to 4 players, or for really fast paced action, use the exclusive Neo Geo "Multi Link" cable for twice the 515 of these polished lanes.
